{{Description|Legend has it that the legacy of the [[Egeria|departed god]] contains the primal power of life and that its power can even surpass the laws of nature.<br>When the pure [[Amrita]] seeps into the barren desert gravel, hope of new life persists in the fertile soil nourished by an underground sea. Now, it is a bastion of growth amid a desolate land ravaged by a [[Cataclysm|tide of darkness]].|Mare Terrae}}
'''Somalata Inland Sea''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in the [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains one level, '''Mare Terrae'''.

===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{w|Cynanchum acidum|Somalata}}|hi=somalatā|hi_tl=moon plant}} is a species of flowering plant in the family {{w|Apocynaceae}}, typically found in the arid parts of peninsular India where it is used in religious sacrifices.
